targets.query:
measurement = "qumulo_info"
fields = ["cluster_name","uuid","max_drive_failures", "max_node_failures", "platform","service_model", "version"]
from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == measurement)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: fields)
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: fields)
  |> rename(columns: {cluster_name: "Cluster Name", uuid: "UUID",platform: "Platform",max_drive_failures: "Max Drive Failures", max_node_failures: "Max Node Failures", service_model: "Service Model", version: "Version"})

from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_fs_snapshots")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_protocol_operation_bytes_total_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> group(columns: ["io_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true) 
  |> yield(name: "rate")

from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_protocol_operations_total_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["io_type"] != "none") 
  |> group(columns: ["io_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true) 
  |> yield(name: "rate")

// Fetch the sum metric and group it
sumMetric = from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_protocol_operation_latency_seconds_sum")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> group(columns: ["protocol", "io_type", "data_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "sum_value"})

// Fetch the count metric and group it
countMetric = from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_protocol_operation_latency_seconds_count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> group(columns: ["protocol", "io_type", "data_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "count_value"})

// Join the metrics
joinedData = join(
  tables: {sum: sumMetric, count: countMetric},
  on: ["_time", "protocol", "io_type", "data_type"]
)

// Calculate the ratio with division by zero handling
result = joinedData
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      protocol: r.protocol,
      io_type: r.io_type,
      data_type: r.data_type,
      ratio: if r.count_value == 0 then 0.0 else r.sum_value / r.count_value
  }))
  |> yield(name: "latency_ratio")

Cluster = "${Cluster}"

// Define a function to create a dataset for a given protocol
createDatasetForProtocol = (protocol) => {
  connections = from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_protocol_client_connections_total_total")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == Cluster)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["protocol"] == protocol)
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

  disconnections = from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_protocol_client_disconnections_total_total")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == Cluster)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["protocol"] == protocol)
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

  return join(
      tables: {conn: connections, disconn: disconnections},
      on: ["_time", "cluster_name", "protocol"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r._value_conn - r._value_disconn, cluster_name: r.cluster_name, protocol: r.protocol }))
}

// Creating and yielding datasets for each protocol
createDatasetForProtocol(protocol: "ftp")
  |> yield(name: "ftpData")

createDatasetForProtocol(protocol: "smb")
  |> yield(name: "smbData")

createDatasetForProtocol(protocol: "nfs")
  |> yield(name: "nfsData")

createDatasetForProtocol(protocol: "rest")
  |> yield(name: "restData")

createDatasetForProtocol(protocol: "s3")
  |> yield(name: "s3Data")

Cluster = "${Cluster}"

// Define a function to create a dataset for a given protocol
createDatasetForProtocol = (protocol) => {
  connections = from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_protocol_client_connections_total_total")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == Cluster)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["protocol"] == protocol)
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

  disconnections = from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_protocol_client_disconnections_total_total")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == Cluster)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["protocol"] == protocol)
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

  return join(
      tables: {conn: connections, disconn: disconnections},
      on: ["_time", "cluster_name", "protocol"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r._value_conn - r._value_disconn, cluster_name: r.cluster_name, protocol: r.protocol }))
}

// Creating and yielding datasets for each protocol
createDatasetForProtocol(protocol: "ftp")
  |> yield(name: "ftpData")

createDatasetForProtocol(protocol: "smb")
  |> yield(name: "smbData")

createDatasetForProtocol(protocol: "nfs")
  |> yield(name: "nfsData")

createDatasetForProtocol(protocol: "rest")
  |> yield(name: "restData")

createDatasetForProtocol(protocol: "s3")
  |> yield(name: "s3Data")

from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_protocol_operation_bytes_total_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> group(columns: ["op_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true) 
  |> yield(name: "rate")

// Fetch the sum metric and group it
sumMetric = from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_protocol_operation_latency_seconds_sum")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> group(columns: ["op_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "sum_value"})

// Fetch the count metric and group it
countMetric = from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_protocol_operation_latency_seconds_count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> group(columns: ["op_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "count_value"})

// Join the metrics
joinedData = join(
  tables: {sum: sumMetric, count: countMetric},
  on: ["_time", "op_name"]
)

// Calculate the ratio with division by zero handling
result = joinedData
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      op_name: r.op_name,
      ratio: if r.count_value == 0 then 0.0 else r.sum_value / r.count_value
  }))
  |> yield(name: "latency_ratio")

import "join"

measurement = "alerts_quota_entries"
fields = ["path", "limit", "capacity_usage"]

left =
  from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == measurement)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entry_type"] == "capacity_usage")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> group()
    |> unique(column: "path")

right =
  from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == measurement)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entry_type"] == "limit")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> group()
    |> unique(column: "path")

join.full(
    left: left,
    right: right,
    on: (l, r) => l.path == r.path,
    as: (l, r) => {
        path = if exists l.path then l.path else r.path

        return {path: path, capacity_usage: l._value, limit: r._value}
    },
)
|> rename(columns: {path: "Path", limit: "Limit", capacity_usage: "Capacity Usage"})

import "join"

measurement = "alerts_quota_entries"
fields = ["path", "limit", "capacity_usage"]

left =
  from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == measurement)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "${QuotaPath}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entry_type"] == "capacity_usage")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> group(columns: ["path"])

right =
  from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == measurement)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "${QuotaPath}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entry_type"] == "limit")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> group(columns: ["path"])

join.full(
    left: left,
    right: right,
    on: (l, r) => l.path == r.path and l._time == r._time,
    as: (l, r) => {
        time = if exists l._time then l._time else r._time
        path = if exists l.path then l.path else r.path

        return {_time: time, path: path, capacity_usage: l._value, limit: r._value}
    },
)
|> rename(columns: {path: "Path", limit: "Limit", capacity_usage: "Capacity Usage"})

  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_cpu_temperature_celsius")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["node_id"] == "${Node}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["node_id"] == "${Node}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_node_info")
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["cluster_name"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["cluster_name"])
  |> distinct(column: "cluster_name")
